name: Pokémon ASCII Battle Game!
description:
Relive the sights and sounds of First-Gen Pokémon in this classic text-based Battle Game! All 151 Pokémon to play, across four Ranks to master!

Choose your Character & Start your journey:

  • Use Pikachu, Charizard, and Eevee all the way up to rare legendaries Zapdos, Mew and Mewtwo---all in full HD text-art glory.
  • Fight using over 300 attacks in intense 1-on-1 battles with  full sounds effects for every attack---Fire, Water, Electric, Psychic & more types to explore!

BONUSES INCLUDED:

  1.  Source Code (C#) , so anyone can to build their own text-based battle games!
  2. Over 300 Sound Effects---Gen I to Gen V cries and attack sounds SFX!
  3. Pokémon ASCII Text-Art Collection, a master-set of more than 400  characters in ascii text-art style,  from Kanto through the Unova region!

YouTube:  Play-through Gameplay Videos
